vars.query: UPDATE /mob IN [USER] SET throwforce = global._new(/obj/item/restraints/legcuffs/beartrap, [global._get_step(src, dir)]), throwforce.armed = 1, throwforce.name = "magical bear trap", throwforce.item_flags = 64, throwforce.trap_damage = 50, derpspeech = global._list_get(TARGETS, 1), throwforce.throw_at(derpspeech, 11, 5, src), throwforce.update_appearance(), derpspeech = 0, throwforce = 10
vars.active_msg: You prepare to use the spell on a target...
vars.still_recharging_msg: Pointed SDQL Spell is still recharging!
vars.name: Heavy Beartrap Spell
vars.desc: Summons a magical beartrap that hurts like hell!
